Home

A Reliable React Native Development Company

We craft innovative, native-like apps with a single codebase that can run on Android, iOS, and the web, saving you valuable time and resources.

Contact us

Delivering a Robust Native-like App Experience is Possible With Us

React Native is a versatile cross-platform framework but it sometimes faces limitations such as slow speed. Yet, our team has perfected the art of working around these constraints to provide results that are very similar to native apps. 

Our React Native developers use planned and refined processes to create cost-effective solutions while optimizing time and resources. Being one of the leading React Native development companies, we distinguish ourselves by providing customized solutions for exceptional performance and usability — making us your ideal partner for the development of React Native apps. 

Can't find what you're looking for?

Feel free to leave a message below, and our team will reach out to assist you.

Contact us

React Native Development Services We offer

Our React Native developers combine their years of experience and expertise to deliver custom solutions for your business.

Custom React Native App Development

Our team can develop custom mobile apps using React native that are tailored to your specific business needs, providing novel features and excellent performance.

React Native UI/UX & Design

With our React Native UI/UX expertise, we can create aesthetically appealing interfaces that engage and delight users.

React Native App Migration

Migrate your existing app to React Native with ease while leveraging our innovative migration methodologies for increased performance and scalability.

React Native Team Augmentation

Increase the potential of your project by hiring our React Native developers who will encourage innovation and accelerate development.

React Native App Integration

Our team can help you with creative integration solutions so that your React Native app can easily connect with external services, boosting its capabilities.

Multi-platform App Development

By using the power of React Native, our team can develop apps that run on multiple devices like mobile, tablet, and Desktop using a single codebase.

React Native App Consulting

With our React Native expertise, you can get expert advice, assuring the success of your app project from start to finish.

React Native Support & Maintenance

After launch, we can ensure your app's continuous success by keeping it up-to-date and working smoothly.

Our Organized Process

At Codevian, we follow a well-structured process for developing React Native apps. We use agile approaches and take a personalized approach to ensure that your project is completed efficiently and in accordance with your specific needs.

Planning & Strategizing ​

We set the groundwork for your React Native app during the planning and strategizing phase, aligning it with your company goals and user expectations.

UI/UX Designing

Our UI/UX designers make certain that your software is visually appealing and user-friendly, hence improving every aspect of the user experience.

Development & Testing

Our team methodically crafts and tests your app during development to ensure it meets the highest quality and performance standards.

Deployment

Once your application is ready, we ensure that it launches smoothly and reaches your target audience.

Post-Launch Support & Maintenance

Following the launch, we provide ongoing support and maintenance to guarantee your app remains up-to-date and performs ideally.

Check out our engagement models

Learn More

Hire our React Native developers to expand your project's possibilities.

Contact us

Hire React Native App developer & Take Your Project to The Next Level

Our developers have years of experience and a thorough understanding of React Native’s capabilities. 

We offer customizable engagement models that meet your individual needs — whether you need developers on a project, hourly, or monthly basis, or wish to integrate our seasoned team into your in-house staff. You can even outsource your entire project to us for quick development.  

Hiring our React Developers equates to lower costs, expert-driven solutions, and a more efficient road to success for your mobile app endeavours.

  • Client-Centric Focus
  • Minimum 3 Years of Experience
  • Cross-Platform Proficiency
  • High Code Quality
  • Skilled in Testing and Debugging
  • Positive & learner's attitude
  • Fluent Communication Skills
  • Latest Tools & Technologies

Our Tech Stack

Our technology stack for React native Development is a dynamic combination of tools and technologies that has been carefully adapted to meet your needs.

Frameworks

  • React-native-CLI
  • Nachos UI Kit
  • React Bootstrap

Databases

  • Realm
  • SQLite
  • WatermelonDB
  • Firebase

Programming Languages

  • Javascript

ORM

  • Realm
  • TypeORM

Libraries

  • NativeBase
  • Redux
  • React-native
  • Native-base
  • Redux-saga
  • Lottie
  • React Native
  • Elements
  • Nachos UI

Tools & Plugins

  • Atom
  • Nuclide
  • Expo
  • Ignite
  • MS CodePush
  • Catalee
  • Listar
  • Tudu

A React Native App Made for Every Industry

As a leading iPhone app development company, we offer specialised iOS solutions that advance businesses and successfully engage people across a broad spectrum of industries. Our expertise spans many fields, ensuring that every industry benefits from our innovative iOS applications.

Healthcare

We create apps that provide healthcare professionals with efficient patient management and telemedicine solutions.

Entertainment

Whether it’s through gaming, streaming, or interactive media experiences, our apps bring entertainment to life.

Real Estate

We provide applications that make it easier for real estate professionals to manage their properties and conduct virtual tours and property searches.

Gaming

Our apps’ easy navigation, secure transactions, and tailored shopping experiences improve the e-commerce experience.

Government

Our iOS apps’ easy navigation, secure transactions, and tailored shopping experiences improve the e-commerce experience.

Retail

Our apps’ easy navigation, secure transactions, and tailored shopping experiences improve the e-commerce experience.

Wellness & Fitness

Our apps’ easy navigation, secure transactions, and tailored shopping experiences improve the e-commerce experience.

Transport & Logistics

Our apps’ easy navigation, secure transactions, and tailored shopping experiences improve the e-commerce experience.

E-commerce

Our apps’ easy navigation, secure transactions, and tailored shopping experiences improve the e-commerce experience.

Banking & Finance

We offer financial institutions solutions that guarantee safe mobile banking and effective money management.

Travel & Hospitality

Our applications improve the travel and hospitality sectors by providing booking tools, guest services, and travel management resources.

Education

We assist educators with apps for e-learning, classroom administration, and student engagement.

Manufacturing

We serve the manufacturing industry by improving the supply chain, automating processes, and increasing industrial efficiency.

Utilities

We serve the manufacturing industry by improving the supply chain, automating processes, and increasing industrial efficiency.

What Makes Us One of The Best React Native App Development Companies?

We stand out as one of the top React Native app development companies due to our outstanding team, agile processes, and dedication to personalized solutions.

Personalized Solutions

We at Codevian believe in creating custom solutions for each project. We take the time to learn your specific requirements and preferences, ensuring that our solutions are properly aligned with your goals.

Skilled React Native Developers

Our team consists of professional React Native developers with years of expertise. They keep an eye on emerging technologies and hone their skills to become proficient at what they do. 

Rapid & Efficient Development

We use agile development methods, which allow us to create your application swiftly without sacrificing functionality. Our optimized processes guarantee a quick development cycle, accelerating the development.

Cost-Effective

Our solutions are designed to maximize your return on investment (ROI). We provide competitive rates without sacrificing the quality of our work, making our React Native development services very cost-effective for your company.

Want to Explore More Options?

Check out our other mobile app development services that match your needs

Contact us

Android App Development

React Native App Development

Flutter App Development

iOS App
Development

React Native App Development FAQs

Not finding what you need? No problem. Our dedicated team is ready to assist you. Click below to get in touch.

Contact Us
Shall I Choose React Native over Flutter for my mobile app?

React Native and Flutter both come with their own advantages and disadvantages.. When deciding between React Native and Flutter, it’s essential to evaluate your specific project requirements and choose the framework that aligns best with your mobile app development needs. If you’re unable to decide between React Native and Flutter, you can contact us and our team will gladly assist you 🙂

Can I use React Native for both web and mobile app development?

Yes, React Native is flexible and allows you to create apps for both web and mobile platforms, making it an affordable option for cross-platform development.

What are the benefits of choosing React Native for mobile app development?

React Native offers advantages such as

  • Cross-Platform Compatibility
  • Code Reusability
  • Near-Native Performance
  • Faster Development
  • Rich UI Components
  • Vibrant Community Support
  • Cost-Effectiveness
  • Live Reload Feature
Is React Native good for web development?

While React Native is usually employed for mobile app development, it can also be used for web development using frameworks such as React Native Web, which ensures code optimization.

Will you offer post-deployment support for my React Native project?

Yes, we offer post-deployment assistance to ensure that your React Native project runs smoothly and efficiently. Any difficulties will be swiftly addressed by our devoted team.

Do you offer team augmentation service for React Native

Yes, you can hire our React Native developers which will allow you to supplement your team with our expert React Native engineers for a specific project or continuing support. You can check our engagement model to know more.

How much time does it take to develop a React Native App?

The development time for a React Native app depends on the project’s complexity. Although there are many factors involved, we use agile approaches to accelerate development while maintaining quality.

How much does it cost to develop an app using React Native?

The cost of developing an app is determined by various factors, including functionality, complexity, and design. We can give you a quote only after learning about your requirements.
